item.title: Browse WSL Path in Windows Explorer
item.description: Open Windows explorer and type this in address bar 1\\wsl$ See details in this article

item.title: NodeJS Install in WSL
item.description: NodeJS 14+ is needed in WSL. Usual installation via apt in Ubuntu doesn't work. This one works so far: 1curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_16.x | sudo -E bash - 2sudo apt-get install -y nodejs

item.title: Reboot Linux under WSL
item.description: Linux systemcmd or init way of rebooting will not work in a Windows Subsystem for Linux or wsl-run Linux. You need to use the Powershell command below: 1wsl --shutdown For other methods, see this article.
